title: If I sleep after Fajr, should I recite the Night Time Athkaar? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: taymur from the uk he says if i were to sleep after fajr should i recite the athkar of bedtime if you slept at night and you read suratul mulk and atkar and you wiped your body with the three coils etc and you woke up before fajr you prayed fajr and went back to sleep you don't have to repeat that but if you did not sleep the whole night and you prayed fajr and you went to bed now you have to read it
